doc.title: 'Kronprinz Wilhelm' with Prince Henry (of Prussia) on Board Arriving in New York
doc.plot: In this most wonderful picture we show the Kronprinz Wilhelm steaming into the New York harbor, surrounded by United States Naval ships and tugs, newspaper tugs, and various pleasure craft, all of which are saluting and blowing their whistles. Our panoramic device is then set in motion, and the Royal yacht Hohenzollern is brought into view as a climax to the film.

In this most wonderful picture we show the Kronprinz Wilhelm steaming into the New York harbor, surrounded by United States Naval ships and tugs, newspaper tugs, and various pleasure craft, all of which are saluting and blowing their whistles. Our panoramic device is then set in motion, and the Royal yacht Hohenzollern is brought into view as a climax to the film.
